one-day postop.context: This patient is one-day postop open parathyroid exploration with subtotal parathyroidectomy and intraoperative PTH monitoring for parathyroid hyperplasia.

open parathyroid exploration.context: This patient is one-day postop open parathyroid exploration with subtotal parathyroidectomy and intraoperative PTH monitoring for parathyroid hyperplasia.

subtotal parathyroidectomy.context: This patient is one-day postop open parathyroid exploration with subtotal parathyroidectomy and intraoperative PTH monitoring for parathyroid hyperplasia.

intraoperative PTH monitoring.context: This patient is one-day postop open parathyroid exploration with subtotal parathyroidectomy and intraoperative PTH monitoring for parathyroid hyperplasia.

parathyroid hyperplasia.context: This patient is one-day postop open parathyroid exploration with subtotal parathyroidectomy and intraoperative PTH monitoring for parathyroid hyperplasia.

uneventful postoperative night.context: She has had an uneventful postoperative night.

1175 mL of urine.context: She put out 1175 mL of urine since surgery.

unremarkable.context: IV site and extremities are unremarkable.

calcium level was 7.5.context: Her calcium level was 7.5 this morning.

Tums.context: She has been on three Tums orally b.i.d. and I am increasing three Tums orally q.i.d. before meals and at bedtime.

heparin lock her IV.context: I will heparin lock her IV, advance her diet, and ambulate her.

advance her diet.context: I will heparin lock her IV, advance her diet, and ambulate her.

ambulate her.context: I will heparin lock her IV, advance her diet, and ambulate her.

prednisone.context: I have asked her to increase her prednisone when she goes home. She will double her regular dose for the next five days.

monitor her calcium levels.context: I will continue to monitor her calcium levels throughout the day.

discharge.context: If they stabilize, I am hopeful that she will be ready for discharge either later today or tomorrow.

Lortab Elixir.context: She will be given Lortab Elixir 2 to 4 teaspoons orally every four hours p.r.n. pain, dispensed #240 mL with one refill.

pain.context: She will be given Lortab Elixir 2 to 4 teaspoons orally every four hours p.r.n. pain, dispensed #240 mL with one refill.
